Metadata.keywords: curiosity, learning, education, knowledge, explore, discover, curio, today, curio.today

feed.title: Feed
feed.description: Explore Curio.today's feed — stories that inspire, amaze, inform, and even expose abuses. A curated stream to spark thought and curiosity.
feed.keywords: Curio.today feed, inspire stories, amazing discoveries, informative articles, exposing abuses, daily inspiration articles, stories that amaze and engage, news that informs the mind, uncovering truths and abuses, thought-provoking content, explore science culture and tech, stories to spark curiosity, curated content platform

amazes.title: Amazes
amazes.description: Content that astounds, surprises, or leaves viewers in awe through extraordinary facts, phenomena, or revelations
amazes.keywords: astonishing, surprising, mind-blowing, incredible, astounding, extraordinary

informs.title: Informs
informs.description: Content that educates, explains, or provides valuable knowledge and information to the audience
informs.keywords: educational, informative, explains, teaches, knowledge, factual, insightful

inspires.title: Inspires
inspires.description: Content that motivates, uplifts, or encourages viewers to take action or think differently
inspires.keywords: motivational, uplifting, encouraging, empowering, aspirational, moving

amuses.title: Amuses
amuses.description: Content that entertains, delights, or brings joy and laughter to the audience
amuses.keywords: entertaining, funny, humorous, delightful, playful, lighthearted, comedic

search.title: Search
search.description: Search our news portal to find the latest articles, breaking stories, and in-depth reports across all categories
search.keywords: news search, latest news articles, breaking news, trending news, in-depth reports, news portal, online news archive, current events

Share.title: Share link
Share.question: Want to share this article?
Share.description: Anyone who has this link will be able to view this

noArticlesAvailable.title: No Articles Available
noArticlesAvailable.description: We couldn’t find any articles for that search. Try a different title or reset your search.

startTypingToSearch.title: Start Typing To search
startTypingToSearch.description: Start typing to find the most related articles.
